data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brugnera, Ricardo, Campos, Luiz Alexandre, Grazia, Jocelia (2019): Revision of Tynacantha Dallas with description of two new species (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae: Asopinae). Zootaxa 4656 (3): 445-458, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4656.3.3|84 occurrences
